title: Spider-Man/Red Sonja (Trade Paperback)
description:
When Manhattan goes medieval, the most amazing heroes of the Marvel and Hyborian Ages must unite to save the day – that is, if they don’t kill each other first! The first time the wicked Kulan Gath attempted to conquer modern-day Earth with his cruel magic, the unlikely duo of Spider-Man and Red Sonja teamed to stop him. But now the sinister sorcerer comes armed with a deadly plan to not only force these two mighty warriors to fight each other, but to also face a host of the web-slinger’s deadliest enemies, including Venom! Collecting SPIDER-MAN/RED SONJA #1-5 — plus
MARVEL TEAM-UP #79, the never-before reprinted tale by
legends Chris Claremont and John Byrne that started it all!
Rated T+ …$14.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-2744-4
